name: init(_:comparator:order:)
desc: Creates a comparator using a key path, a sort comparator to compare values at that key path, and a sort order that you specify.
declaration: init<Value, Comparator>(_ keyPath: KeyPath<Compared, Value>, comparator: Comparator, order: SortOrder) where Value == Comparator.Compared, Comparator : SortComparator
